TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResiliencePipelineProvider

Docs.summary: The resilience pipeline provider creates and caches pipeline instances that are configured using .
Docs.remarks: Use this interface to create instances of both generic and non-generic resilience pipelines.

Public Function GetPipeline(Of TResult) (pipelineName As String, pipelineKey As String) As IAsyncPolicy(Of TResult)
abstract member GetPipeline : string * string -> Polly.IAsyncPolicy<'Result>

Docs.typeparam: The type of the result returned by the action executed by the policies.
Docs.param: The pipeline key associated with a cached instance of a pipeline.
Docs.summary: Gets a pipeline instance cached by . If the target pipeline is not cached yet, the provider creates and caches it and then returns the instance.
Docs.remarks: This method enables to have multiple instances of the same pipeline that are cached by the . Make sure that the pipeline identified by is configured, otherwise the provider won't be able to create it and throws an exception.
Docs.exception: The pipeline identified by is invalid or not configured.
